title: Budget Waterproof Ski Jacket Shell, Lightweight Windproof Snow Jacket (Entry Level)
description: Simple waterproof shell with basic seam sealing, light insulation for mild conditions.

title: PVC-Coated Snow Jacket, High-Shine Weatherproof Outer (Urban Snow Style)
description: Glossy PVC exterior for water resistance, warm insulation, bold city-slope look.

title: All-Mountain Insulated Ski Jacket with Venting Zips (Mid-Range)
description: Balanced warmth and breathability, pit zips and powder skirt for resort skiing.

title: Technical Ski Jacket, Durable Shell with Alpine Fit (Backcountry Ready)
description: Abrasion-resistant shell with articulated sleeves, designed for touring and climbing.

title: Classic Down Ski Jacket, Premium Warmth with Lifestyle Styling
description: Down-filled insulation for cold days, heritage print for standout resort style.

title: Premium 3-in-1 Ski Jacket, Removable Insulated Liner (Versatile)
description: Shell plus insulated inner jacket for adaptable layering across temperatures.

title: Pro-Grade Gore-Tex Ski Jacket, Multi-Color Kit (Stormproof)
description: Fully waterproof Gore-Tex shell, designed for harsh weather and long days.

title: Lightweight Resort Ski Jacket, Slim Fit with Minimal Bulk
description: Streamlined insulation for mobility, ideal for spring skiing and layering.
